body:
Hi Örn,

This is a great question for Radiance's email list. If they can't help you there, which I'm pretty sure they will, I will be happy to take on this one.

It can be both because of the material definition or radiance parameters. I assume you have already checked this document (<font color="#000000">[http://radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2010-freiburg/PDF/Da...](http://radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2010-freiburg/PDF/DavidMead.pdf)</font>). If you haven't then you should.
